name: Brick Break (Sam)
description:
Simple version of brick break I made to try out Godot and make a small game. Cool learning experience, but I think I'll stick with unity personally.

Controls:

A: move left 

D: move right

Space: start/restart the game

Credits:

Art: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/puzzle-pack

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/arcade-racing-tune

SFX: Bfxr

Engine: Godot
